STI_DOC.P: IBRD Project ID No. P127876, IBRD Loan No. 8255-YF

PREPARATION OF MAIN DESIGNS FOR HEAVY MAINTENANCE (ROAD REHABILITATION-UPGRADING) OF THE STATE ROADS IA 1 AND IA 3, LOT 1: IA 1, SECTION: RAZANJ 1 — PARACIN 1, L=24.781 KM, LOT 2: IA 1, SECTION: ALEKSINAC 1 — RAZANJ 1, L=23.645 KM, LOT 3: IA 3, SECTION: SREMSKA MITROVICA — RUMA 1, L=13.750 KM AND LOT 4: IA 3, SECTION: RUMA 1 — PECINCI 1, L=12.990 KM

CONTENTS.P: Selection was conducted through the quality and cost based selection (QCBS) method as stated under the relevant World Bank’s Guidelines: Selection and employment of consultants under IBRD loans and IDA credits and grants by World bank borrowers issued in January 2011.
On 3.3.2017, request for proposal was sent to the following 6 consultants in accordance with the consultants’ short list approved by the European investment bank on 23.1.2017:
Investigación y control de calidad S.A. (INCOSA), Spain (JV leader)
Geoconsult España Ingenieros Consultores S.A (GEOCONSULT), Spain (JV partner)
IPSA Institut DOO, Bosnia and Herzegovina (JV partner)
BOTEK Bosphorus Technical Consulting Co., Turkey (JV leader)
Project Biro UTIBER DOO, Serbia (JV leader)
KREBS+KIEFER Eastern Europe GmbH, Germany (JV leader)
Geing Krebs und Kiefer International and others Ltd, Macedonia (JV partner)
CPS INGENIEROS, OBRA CIVIL Y MEDIO AMBIENTE, S.L., Spain (JV leader)
The overall technical scores and scores assigned for each criterion and sub-criterion to each consultant were the following:
01 JV CPS Ingenieros S.L. and Geoput d.o.o.
02 JV Project Biro UTIBER d.o.o., UTIBER Ltd., PANPRO TEAM d.o.o., DUODEC and Via Inzenjering
03 JV BOTEK Bosphorus Technical Consulting Co. and MHMprojekt d.o.o.
04 JV NET Engineering S.p.A., Hidroprojekatsaobracaj d.o.o.
The prices offered by each consultant as read out and as converted to currency of evaluation were as follows:
Consultants' names: JV CPS Ingenieros S.L. and Geoput DOO
Conversion to currency of evaluation (RSD): Exchange rate(s): (2): 124.0308
Conversion to currency of evaluation (RSD): Proposals’ prices: (3) = (1) * (2): 71 325 873.71
Consultants' names: JV Project Biro UTIBER DOO, UTIBER Ltd., PANPRO TEAM DOO, DUODEC and Via Inzenjering
Conversion to currency of evaluation (RSD): Exchange rate(s): (2): 1.0000
Conversion to currency of evaluation (RSD): Proposals’ prices: (3) = (1) * (2): 81 258 586.00
Consultants' names: JV BOTEK Bosphorus Technical Consulting Co. and MHM-projekt DOO
Conversion to currency of evaluation (RSD): Exchange rate(s): (2): 124.0308
Conversion to currency of evaluation (RSD): Proposals’ prices: (3) = (1) * (2): 74 105 426.26
Consultants' names: JV NET Engineering S.p.A., Hidroprojekat-saobracaj DOO
Conversion to currency of evaluation (RSD): Exchange rate(s): (2): 124.0308
Conversion to currency of evaluation (RSD): Proposals’ prices: (3) = (1) * (2): 86 269 622.94
Final rank of the consultants was as follows:
Consultants’ names: JV CPS Ingenieros S.L. and Geoput DOO
Consultants’ names: JV Project Biro UTIBER d.o.o., UTIBER Ltd., PANPRO TEAM d.o.o., DUODEC and Via Inzenjering
Consultants’ names: JV BOTEK Bosphorus Technical Consulting Co. and MHM-projekt DOO
Consultants’ names: JV Net Engineering S.p.A., Hidroprojekat-saobracaj DOO
Recommendation for the contract award went to the Consultant with the highest combined technical and financial score.
Successful Consultant: JV BOTEK Bosphorus Technical Consulting Co. and MHMprojekt DOO

Scope of contract: Consulting services for preparation of main designs for heavy Maintenance (Road rehabilitation-upgrading) of the State Roads IA 1 and IA 3, Lot 1: IA 1, Section: Razanj 1 — Paracin 1, L=24.781 km, Lot 2: IA 1, Section: Aleksinac 1 — Razanj 1, L=23.645 km, Lot 3: IA 3, Section: Sremska Mitrovica — Ruma 1, L=13.750 km and Lot 4: IA 3, Section: Ruma 1 — Pecinci 1, L=12.990 km
